name: Echo Sabre
description: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

abilities.name: Echo Strike
abilities.description: The next attack grants the wielder a buff that greatly increases attack speed for one attack.
notes: Ranged heroes cannot use Echo Strike
The triggering attack also briefly slows the enemy's movement speed. The second attack does not slow
The effect triggers upon reaching the attack point of an attack, regardless of whether the attack lands or not
The attack speed buff has no set duration. It lasts until the user makes a second attack
Echo Strike triggers on Instant Attacks as well, except specific sources like Sproink, Side Gunner, Infest, etc.
Does not stack with Falcon Rush
The slow debuff cannot be applied by Clones
Multiple instances of the slow debuff do not stack

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 330 health and 1.5 health regeneration
Grants 15 main attack damage to strength heroes
Grants 6.75 main attack damage to universal heroes
Shares cooldown with other echo-type items
